MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L32 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Morston Walk, Bewley Drive and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:47AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault, and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.59PM on 12th January 2021
